chat.title: Chat with Your Data
chat.description: Ask anything about your store in natural language
chat.userMessage1: What are my best performing products this month?
chat.aiResponse1:
Your top 3 products are:
1. Winter Parka ($2,340 revenue)
2. Cozy Sweater ($1,890 revenue)
3. Thermal Leggings ($1,650 revenue)

Winter Parka has a 34% profit margin and is trending up 23% vs last month.
chat.userMessage2: Should I increase the price of Winter Parka?
chat.aiResponse2: Yes! Based on demand trends and competitor analysis, you can increase the price by 12-15% without affecting sales. This could boost monthly profit by $280.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: WOW AI ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our Shopify application. By installing and using WOW AI, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.description: When you install and use WOW AI, we collect and process the following types of data from your Shopify store:

storeInfo.title: Store and Business Information
items: Store name, domain, and contact information
Store settings and configurations
Analytics and performance data
Order history and transaction data

customerData.title: Customer Data
items: Customer names, email addresses, and contact information
Purchase history and order details
Customer behavior and interaction data

productData.title: Product and Inventory Data
items: Product information, descriptions, and images
Inventory levels and fulfillment data
Pricing and discount information

marketingData.title: Marketing and Engagement Data
items: Marketing campaign performance
Customer engagement metrics
Promotional activities and discount usage

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use the collected data to:
items: Provide AI-powered insights and recommendations to help you optimize your store performance
Analyze store performance and identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement
Manage and automate promotions, orders, and product operations through our AI copilot
Generate analytics and reports to help you make informed business decisions
Improve our service by understanding how merchants use our application
Provide customer support and respond to your inquiries
Ensure compliance with legal obligations and platform requirements

dataSecurity.title: Data Storage and Security
dataSecurity.description: We take data security seriously and implement industry-standard measures to protect your information:
measures: Data is encrypted in transit using TLS/SSL protocols
We use secure cloud infrastructure with access controls and monitoring
Access to your data is restricted to authorized personnel only
We regularly review and update our security practices
dataSecurity.retention: Your data is stored securely on servers located in compliance with applicable data protection regulations. We retain your data only for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
circumstances: With your consent: When you explicitly authorize us to share specific information
Service providers: With trusted third-party services that help us operate our application (e.g., cloud hosting, AI processing)
Legal compliance: When required by law, court order, or government request
Business transfers: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
Protection of rights: To protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property, and that of our users
dataSharing.shopifySync: All customer data collected through Shopify channels is synced to the Shopify admin and made accessible to you as the merchant.

yourRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
yourRights.description: As a merchant using WOW AI, you have the following rights:
rights: Access: Request access to the data we hold about your store
Correction: Request corrections to inaccurate or incomplete data
Deletion: Request deletion of your data by uninstalling the app or contacting us
Opt-out: Opt-out of marketing communications at any time
Data portability: Request a copy of your data in a machine-readable format
yourRights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at support@getwow.ai

dataRetention.title: Data Retention and Deletion
dataRetention.description: When you uninstall WOW AI from your Shopify store:
process: We will automatically cease collecting new data from your store
You can request immediate deletion of all your data by contacting us
We will delete or anonymize your data within 30 days of your request
Some data may be retained for legal compliance purposes, as required by law

marketing.title: Marketing and Communications
marketing.withConsent: With your consent, we may send you:
communications: Tips and best practices for using WOW AI
marketing.optOut: You can opt-out of marketing communications at any time by:
optOutMethods: Clicking the "unsubscribe" link in any marketing email
marketing.note: Note: We may still send you essential service-related communications even if you opt-out of marketing emails.

compliance.title: Compliance with Data Protection Laws
compliance.description: We comply with applicable data protection regulations, including:
regulations: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) for European merchants
California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) for California merchants
Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA) for Canadian merchants
Other applicable regional data protection laws

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: WOW AI may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to:
purposes: Maintain your session and authentication status
cookies.control: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: WOW AI integrates with third-party services to provide AI-powered functionality. These services have their own privacy policies:
services: Shopify (for store data access and API integration)
AI/ML service providers (for generating insights and recommendations)
Cloud infrastructure providers (for data storage and processing)
thirdParty.review: We encourage you to review the privacy policies of these third-party services.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes by:
notifications: Posting the updated policy on this page
Updating the "Last updated" date at the top
Sending you a notification through the app or email
changes.acceptance: Your continued use of WOW AI after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.introduction: Welcome to **WOW AI** ("we", "our", "us"). These Terms & Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of our website, products, and services (collectively, the "Service"). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the Service.

useOfService.title: Use of the Service
items: You must be at least 18 years old to use the Service.
You agree to use the Service only for lawful purposes.
You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and login credentials.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.description: When you create an account, you must provide accurate and complete information. We may suspend or terminate your account if:
reasons: We detect suspicious or abusive activity

dataPrivacy.title: Data & Privacy
dataPrivacy.description: Your use of the Service is also governed by our Privacy Policy:
dataPrivacy.consent: By using the Service, you consent to the collection and processing of your data as described in the Privacy Policy.

paymentBilling.title: Payment & Billing (if applicable)
items: Some features require a paid subscription.
Fees, billing cycles, and refund rules will be clearly displayed before purchase.
We may change pricing with notice sent to your registered email.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All content, trademarks, code, and materials within the Service are the property of WOW AI or its licensors. You may not copy, modify, or redistribute any part of the Service without permission.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.description: Our Service may integrate with third-party platforms (e.g., Salla, Shopify, Meta). We are not responsible for:
items: Their content
Their downtime
Their actions or policies
thirdPartyServices.note: You are responsible for complying with their terms as well.

serviceAvailability.title: Service Availability
serviceAvailability.description: We aim to keep the Service running smoothly but do not guarantee:
items: Uninterrupted access
Error-free performance
Instant data syncing
serviceAvailability.reservation: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the Service.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, WOW AI is not liable for:
items: Losses resulting from misuse of the Service
Downtime or service interruptions
Errors caused by third-party platforms or integrations
limitationOfLiability.risk: Your use of the Service is at your own risk.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may suspend or terminate your access if you violate these Terms. You may stop using the Service at any time.

changesToTerms.title: Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.description: We may update these Terms from time to time. When we do, we will update the "Last Updated" date at the top of the page. Continued use of the Service means you accept the updated Terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about these Terms, you can contact us at:

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion Instructions
dataDeletion.introduction: At WOW AI, we respect your privacy and give all users the right to request the deletion of their personal data in accordance with applicable laws and platform requirements (including Meta/WhatsApp). This page explains how you can request the removal of all personal data associated with your account.

howToRequest.title: How to Request Data Deletion
howToRequest.description: To delete your personal data, please follow these steps:
steps: Send an email to **support@getwow.ai** with the subject line: **"Data Deletion Request"**
Include the following information in your message:
The email or phone number associated with your WOW AI account
The app or integration you are requesting deletion for (e.g., WOW AI App)
Our team will verify your identity and process the deletion request.

whatWillBeDeleted.title: What Data Will Be Deleted
whatWillBeDeleted.description: Once verified, we will permanently delete:
items: Your account information
Store or integration data associated with your account
Any synced analytics or app-generated insights
Any data required to operate your instance of the app
whatWillBeDeleted.note: Some anonymized, non-identifiable logs may remain for security and compliance.

processingTime.title: Processing Time
processingTime.description: Data deletion requests are typically processed within **7‚Äì14 business days**. You will receive a confirmation email once deletion is complete.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions about data deletion or privacy, contact us at:

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: We're here to help you succeed with WOW AI. Reach out to our team for support, questions, or just to say hello!

emailSupport.title: Email Support
emailSupport.description: Get help via email. We typically respond within 24 hours.

q1.question: What is WOW AI?
q1.answer: WOW AI is your smart e-commerce assistant. It connects to your store on Salla or Shopify and analyzes your sales, customer, and product data to provide you with daily insights, ready-made recommendations, and growth plans that help you increase revenue easily.

q2.question: How does WOW AI help me grow my store?
q2.answer: WOW AI analyzes your store data and tells you what to do today to improve performance, such as:
items: Most profitable products
Most loyal customers
Promotions that achieve the best results
Inventory or pricing issues that affect profits
q2.summary: In simple terms: it transforms your data into smart daily decisions.

q3.question: Is the app free?
q3.answer: Yes ‚úÖ You can start using WOW AI completely free. Users will be able to try the basic features ‚Äî such as daily insights, smart tasks, and chatting with the assistant ‚Äî at no cost.

q4.question: Do I need technical expertise to use WOW AI?
q4.answer: Not at all. WOW AI is designed for store owners and brand managers, not programmers or data analysts. All you need to do is connect your store, and WOW AI will do the rest automatically.

q5.question: How is WOW AI different from traditional dashboards?
q5.answer: Traditional dashboards only show numbers, while WOW AI provides smart recommendations that tell you what to do to increase sales and reduce losses. It's not just an analytics tool, but a smart partner that thinks with you.

q6.question: What platforms does WOW AI integrate with?
q6.answer: WOW AI currently integrates with Salla and Shopify, and will soon support other platforms like Google Ads and Meta to track ad performance directly.

q7.question: Is my store data secure?
q7.answer: Absolutely üîí WOW AI does not share your data with any third parties. A secure connection (API) is used with full data encryption, and the AI only works to analyze performance and provide recommendations within your account.

q8.question: How long does setup take?
q8.answer: Setup takes less than two minutes. Once you log in and connect your store, WOW AI immediately begins analyzing your data and sends the first daily insights within hours.

q9.question: Can I talk to WOW AI in Arabic?
q9.answer: Yes! ü§ñ WOW AI understands Arabic and English, and you can chat with it naturally to ask about your products' performance, customers, or even advertising campaigns.
